prompt:
80 MLD advanced plant with COMPREHENSIVE PIPING NETWORK:
Primary connections:
- 1200mm diameter raw water main (blue)
- 800mm diameter settled water mains (green)  
- 600mm diameter filtered water mains (white)

Secondary connections:
- Backwash supply lines (red)
- Sludge draw-off pipes (brown)
- Chemical dosing lines (yellow)
- Sample lines (clear)

Include:
- Pipe bridges at intersections
- Valve stations at all junctions
- Flow control structures
- Air release valves at high points
